extension.name: AMC Slideshow
extension.author: Anthony McLin
extension.description: This module provides a Javascript-based slideshow. It requires the template to include Mootools 1.2 and the Clientcide library

field.name: randomize
field.label: Randomize
field.description: Randomize the display order on page load. If no is selected images will be displayed alphabetically.

field.name: timed
field.label: Timed
field.description: Select whether the slideshow does timed auto-advances.

field.name: delay
field.label: Delay
field.description: Set the time delay between images in miliseconds.

field.name: type
field.label: Image Type
field.description: Type of image PNG/GIF/JPG etc. (default is JPG)

field.name: subfolders
field.label: Include SubFolders
field.description: Check on if you wish subdirectories to be included in the slideshow.

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
